note.p: Poulterer and dealer in game and live animals. Of 3 Half Moon Passage, Gracechurch Street, London, 1869; 152 Kings Road (‘The Pheasantry’), Chelsea, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/82/75/28), 1901 (RG13/72/122/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 March 2017)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 March 2017)
